articles.title: CNN news is coming to Warner Bros. Discovery streaming service Max - CNBC
articles.description: The move comes more than a year after Warner Bros. Discovery shut down the weeks-old streaming platform CNN+.
articles.content:
CNN is coming to streaming again.
Warner Bros. Discovery announced Thursday that CNN Max will be added to its Max streaming service Sept. 27, and will serve as a 24/7 live news hub.

articles.title: Alec Baldwin's request to dismiss 'Rust' civil lawsuit denied by judge - USA TODAY
